attributes.action: Sarah Newton MP to provide evidence that alcohol is not a harmful drug.
attributes.additional_details:
The National Institute for Health and Care Excellence guidelines says “There is unfortunately no ‘safe’ alcohol limit when it comes to increasing one’s cancer risk.”

https://www.nice.org.uk/news/article/new-recommended-drinking-guidelines-welcomed-by-nice
attributes.background:
Sarah Newton stood before Parliament in the recent drug strategy debate and stated that alcohol is not a harmful drug.
Alcohol kills over twice as many people as any illegal drug each year. 
Sarah Newton should provide evidence alcohol is not harmul even in moderation or apologize in Parliament

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for the views and opinions of individual MPs.

You could start a new petition that clearly asks the Government or Parliament to take action. 

We can only accept petitions from named individuals, not organisations.
